flag | id; type | critic; album | name; critic | blabla; rate | n; email | eeee; flag | id; type | critic; result | (y/n); album | name; critic | blabla; rate | n; msg | mmmmm;

ratingC - Variable in class Album
 
readArtistsFromDisk() - Static method in class ObjectFiles
 
readUsersFromDisk() - Static method in class ObjectFiles
 
receiveUDPDatagram(String) - Method in class shared.RMIServer
Try's to receive a Datagram via Multicast If socket is activated for + than 5 seconds without getting an answer form Multicast the setSoTimeout() creates an exception that re-sends the Datagram to Multicast that was supposed to generate the response.
refreshMulticastHashes() - Method in class shared.RMIServer
RMI sends: Request -> flag | id; type | connectionrequest; Multicast responds: Response -> flag | id; type | ack; hash | hhhh;
register(String, String, String, String) - Method in class MulticastServerResponse
Method to register a new user.
register(String, String) - Method in class shared.RMIServer
Receives a name and password creates datagram with the following protocol: Sends to Multicast: Request -> flag | id; type | register; email | eeee; password | pppp; Receives from Multicast: Response -> flag | id; type | register; result | (y/n); email | eeee; password | pppp; msg | mmmmmm; If result | y -> successes If result | n -> failed, returns an error message to RMIClient
register(String, String) - Method in interface shared.RMIServerInterface
 
regularToEditor(String, String) - Method in class shared.RMIServer
Request -> flag | id; type | privilege; user1 | username; user2; username; Response -> flag | id; type | privilege; result | (y/n): user1 | username; user2 | username; msg | mmmmmmmm; Try's to cast @param regular to editor If the op. is successful the notification to the @param editor comes along in the UDP Datagram the client with email == @param editor in clients concurrentHashMap gets printed w/ printOnClient() method
regularToEditor(String, String) - Method in interface shared.RMIServerInterface

RMIClient - Class in <Unnamed>
This class will be runned in the Client's machine.
shared.RMIClientInterface - Interface in <Unnamed>
Remote Interface of client getEmail() was used for debugging only printOnClient() is used by the shared.RMIServer to print notifications in the clients command line.
shared.RMIServer - Class in <Unnamed>
shared.RMIServer contains all methods that RMI Client can call via remote interface.
rmiserver.RMIServer() - Constructor for class shared.RMIServer
 
shared.RMIServerInterface - Interface in <Unnamed>
This class contains all remote methods from shared.RMIServer class.
run() - Method in class MulticastServer
Main loop of Multicast, starts by reading users.obj and artists.obj, then proceeds to create a new MulticastSocket, joins the group and sends an `ack` to shared.RMIServer.
run() - Method in class MulticastServerResponse
Thread that receives a packet, parses it with cleanTokens() and calls the respective function depending on type of packet
